subject: Music
Football
lead_paragraph: The face of Nashville’s N.F.L. franchise, Kerry Collins is also becoming a player off the field in Music City — someone would-be singers and writers hope can help them break into the industry.
snippet: The face of Nashville’s N.F.L. franchise, Kerry Collins is also becoming a player off the field in Music City — someone would-be singers and writers hope can help them break into the industry.
